extendedInfo.description: Get ready to cast magic spells as hordes of ghosts, zombies, skeletons and other nasty fiends are about to invade your castle! Magic Defense is #1 defense game with unique mix of high strategy and intense action.Brilliantly executed with innovative game-play and built from the ground up for Android phones and tablets, Magic Defense evolves the defense genre and pushes mobile gaming to new heights. The game takes place on the fictional continents and you are the lord of the northern border of the kingdom. And it is your job to defend the kingdom from evil creatures. Now start the epic fantasy journey with your magic powers!How to Play:- Slide your finger on the screen to fire lightening balls- Tap on the screen and Draw the gesture to cast special magic spellsGame Features:- Stunning graphics with a highly polished user interface- Full Save/Load functionality- 7 different types of special magic spells to master- Hundreds of enemy forces and special power-ups

reviews.title: Good fun
reviews.comment: Nice useability easy to learn good upgrade choices
reviews.author: Mike Doyer

reviews.title: addicting..
reviews.comment: coOL apps.. Level 83 and still playing! mOre mOnster character please, 2 thumbs up so far..
reviews.author: edcO centinO

reviews.title: Update this game :) its amazing
reviews.comment: I\'m in level 241 and I got 1M gold and I upgrade all stats magic and castle all in max level I suggest that you should add more level in magic, castle defense, and the basic .. Thanks
reviews.author: Lelouch Lamperouch

reviews.title: Easy!!
reviews.comment: This game is too easy once you have achieved mout powerful weapons and magic. But its still fun.
reviews.author: Matt Ricker

reviews.title: Interesting
reviews.comment: Can\'t stop playing. Its very good. Good graphics, power, sound track. Everything\'s good.
reviews.author: Siva K

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: I guess i\'m too lazy for this game.don\'t like having to Swype the screen for every attack. if do on the other hand like the special Weapon gestures. Just not for me at the end of the day!
reviews.author: Matt Hull

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Quit boring forva long time.. Need more action
reviews.author: Ayop Tulakang

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: Nice game. Very addicting and boring. Well, i passed lv 100 in 3 hour. It\'s very easy, that\'s what make this game feel boring. But it\'s ok. I like this game because i can cast a spell with gesture. Anyway, can you add more spells again? Tq.
reviews.author: bondan fernanda

reviews.title: Fun, but short.
reviews.comment: Really fun game, but it only takes twenty minutes to unlock the biggest powerups. It\'s very easy overall
reviews.author: Josiah White

reviews.title: Excellent time killer!
reviews.comment: Amazing game! Has that addicting quality to it. Could do with more variety in level backdrops and more monsters to fight, but that\'s  not something that would lower the rating. Has some minor bugs in the upgrade section but nothing game breaking.
reviews.author: Gordan Vrbanec

reviews.title: samsunp galaxy y
reviews.comment: wow this great game! addicting! :)
reviews.author: Jerian Tomis

reviews.comment: Fun but I\'m too cheap to spend real cash to upgrade so I get more firepower to level.\tSee above.
reviews.author: Catherine Leonard

reviews.title: Perfect but....
reviews.comment: D coins i purchase didnt add up on my total amt. I wasnt able to do upgrade and i havent received any assistance yet :(
reviews.author: margie lou Herring

reviews.title: Loved it!!!
reviews.comment: Worth installing. Addictive. Fun to play. Nice graphics for 4mb
reviews.author: Amogh Gokhale

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Fun to play.. I\'m on level 300. One bug though whenever I try to upgrade the fire spell it keeps on coming back to level 3.. besides that everything else is maxed out and ooh I hope you make new monsters and upgrades.. I\'ve got 1.3m which I can\'t use cause all upgrades are maxed out
reviews.author: Dee Cypher

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: The controls are ok, but this is still a great game. I recommend anyone to download.
reviews.author: Jaime Yates

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: I\'m having no problem playing this game that\'s why im giving it 5 stars. Should download this game and Enjoy playing too! :)
reviews.author: Queenie Lim

reviews.title: Great Game (Too Easy)
reviews.comment: It\'s a great game. I enjoy it a lot Play it to kill some time but I honestly think it need to be a little bit harder. I\'ve been playing and literally have yet to have any monsters pass more than half way of map and currently at level 60.
reviews.author: Roberto Varona

reviews.title: THE BEST GAME EVER
reviews.comment: I like everything abt this game! From the graphic, music, sound effect, colours, game story.. Absolutely fantastic! Now I\'m at level 91. I really have to share this game. Download it now! :) Good work.
reviews.author: Lonna Spencer

reviews.title: GREAT JOB MAKE MORE GAMES LIKE THIS ONE.
reviews.comment: LOVE THIS GAME!!!
reviews.author: Tye Adams
